             <p style="margin: 4px 0px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; orphans: 2; text-align: center; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; letter-spacing: normal; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: 瀹嬩綋, serif; font-size: 14px; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);"><img alt="那些不生小孩的人，后来怎样了" src="http://cms-bucket.ws.126.net/2019/05/24/195d30b1a0534bf480e08c76c95e8a11.png?imageView&amp;thumbnail=550x0" style="border: 1px solid rgb(204, 204, 204);"/></p>,

</p>,
             <p></p>],
 'pub_data': ['2019-08-19 11:17:38'],
 'title': '一辈子没升迁，他拍下乡镇干部的快乐与哀愁'}
2019-08-27 14:54:08 [scrapy.core.scraper] DEBUG: Scraped from <200 https://money.163.com/19/0825/09/ENDPM9JC002580S6.html>
{'_id': 'https://money.163.com/19/0825/09/ENDPM9JC002580S6.html',
 'content': [<p class="otitle">
                        （原标题：调查｜“暴利”背后的月子中心：收费上十万，多数仍在亏钱）
                    </p>,
             <p>中新经纬客户端8月24日电 善于经商的犹太人认为世界上有两种人的钱最好赚，一种是女人，另一种是孩子，而“<a href="/keywords/5/5/575067085b50/1.html" target="_blank" title="坐月子">坐月子</a>”这个特殊时期就把这两个目标群体全部囊括了。借着“二胎”政策的东风，不少商家瞅准这一市场需求，月子中心应运而生。</p>,
             <p class="f_center"><img alt="“暴利”背后的月子中心：收费上十万" height="400" src="http://crawl.ws.126.net/1c013e9d3932ac82b1a6e16f72aa5ee7.jpg" width="600"/></p>,
             <p>受访者供图</p>,
             <p>
<b>市场：潜力显现 北上广月子中心5万起步</b></p>,
             <p>在北上广等一线城市，去月子中心坐月子已经成为不少准妈妈们的备选项之一。</p>,
             <p>家住广州的李女士今年8月生下了一名“猪宝宝”，生完第三天提前订好的月子中心便派车将她直接从医院接到了月子中心。</p>,
             <p>“新手爸爸妈妈经验少，上一辈的育儿经验多数也已经过时，没有月子中心或者<a href="/keywords/6/0/67085ac2/1.html" target="_blank" title="月嫂">月嫂</a>的帮助还真是有点搞不定。”李女士说。</p>,
             <p>李女士所在的月子中心收费标准为28天5万元，42天约为8万元，这个价格对于李女士年入20万的小家庭来说还是有些“肉痛”，不过想到可以给刚出生的宝宝更周到的护理，让<a href="/keywords/4/a/4ea75987/1.html" target="_blank" title="产妇">产妇</a>更快地恢复，还可以避免坐月子期间可能发生的婆媳矛盾，李女士的先生在三个月前便毫不犹豫地订下了这个月子中心。</p>,
             <p>北京某月子中心的销售人员告诉中新经纬客户端，北京月子中心的价格从5万元至几十万元不等。因为今年是猪年，很多人想生“金猪”宝宝，选择月子中心也需要早做打算。“起码要在怀孕三四个月的时候就开始选了，想订到朝向好、楼层好的房间更要早点下手。”</p>,
             <p>上述销售人员介绍，该院月子套餐有三种房型，月子28天分别是标准房间122888元、VIP房间208800元、VIP套房228800元。以最便宜的标准房间122888元计算，住一天价格约4388元。据BOSS直聘发布的《2019二季度人才吸引力报告》显示，2019年第二季度，北京平均月薪为12116元，也就意味着不吃不喝工作近一年才能住得起28天的标准房间。</p>,
             <p>花这么多钱住月子中心值吗？中新经纬客户端走访发现，月子中心的服务主要分为针对产妇和婴儿两大类，内容包含婴儿一对一护理、产妇护理、<a href="/keywords/6/0/67085b509910/1.html" target="_blank" title="月子餐">月子餐</a>等等。各家月子中心的主打特色各不相同，有的主打中医理疗、有的主打医院资源丰富、有的宣称擅长美容保健。</p>,
             <p>中新经纬客户端实地走访了几家天津市的月子中心，大致可以分为三种，第一种是以和睦家、美中宜和等私立医院为代表的医院系月子中心，该类月子中心主打医疗资源，价格也相对更高；第二种是租下或者购买酒店，并改装为月子中心，是市场上最多的形式；第三种是民宿式，租下别墅或办公楼等房间，改装为月子中心。</p>,
             <p>某月子中心直接租下一层中国风装修的酒店，工作人员介绍说，这样可以避免因装修带来的味道。据观察，入住该月子中心的产妇并不多，在一层二十间房间中，入住率尚不及三分之一。</p>,
             <p><strong>资本：抢滩月子中心 三年存活率低至20%</strong></p>,
             <p>随着二胎政策的放开，越来越多创业者将眼光投向了月子中心。天眼查数据显示，以“月子中心”为关键词搜索，约有2246家公司的经营范围中包括“母婴月子生活咨询服务”。</p>,
             <p>在创业者看来，月子中心门槛低，利润高，属于刚性需求，在国内尚处于起步阶段，市场空间仍未饱和，未来发展空间还很大。</p>,
             <p>著名经济学家宋清辉向中新经纬客户端介绍，据清晖智库统计，2019年<a href="/keywords/6/0/67085b504f1a6240/1.html" target="_blank" title="月子会所">月子会所</a>市场规模将达到200亿元，市场前景广阔。再加上准入门槛和市场集中度较低，行业增长势头迅猛，引发市场资本蜂拥而至。</p>,
             <p>新三板挂牌公司大美股份2018年年报显示，据不完全统计，目前国内各种规模的妇婴健康护理机构总数超过4000家，其中北京约80家，上海约120家，西安约100家，南京、武汉、成都各50-60家，其他省会城市20-30家，经济发达的地级市均陆续开设，服务产妇数量接近总数的 2%，以经济条件中高端群体为主。月子中心服务普及率较高的城市上海，进入月子中心接受服务的产妇超过年度总数的10%，正在发展中的城市例如南京达到了7%左右，该项服务因为社会整体消费服务升级的原因，被越来越多的产妇家庭所选择。</p>,
             <p>不过，看似暴利的月子中心，赚起钱来却并不容易。在资本汹涌杀入之后，不少经营者发现月子中心市场并没有想象中那么美好，更有不少月子中心因经营不善倒闭、撤离。</p>,
             <p>2018年10月文文生下儿子后就住进了天津市嘉贝爱尔国际养生月子会所，这家月子中心位于南开区的一座写字楼，大众点评显示该月子中心人均消费3万元左右，这个价格在天津市月子中心属于中位数。文文认为这家月子中心房间大、有一对一服务、月子餐可口。不过，文文听说在2019年4月这家月子中心倒闭了。</p>,
             <p>中新经纬客户端拨打大众点评上该月子中心留下的电话，一位女士接听后表示，她是这家月子中心的前员工，目前已经离职，只知道该月子中心确实要关门了。</p>,
             <p class="f_center"><img alt="“暴利”背后的月子中心：收费上十万" height="382" src="http://crawl.ws.126.net/f217704f3ed95e15743005a834687bb0.jpg" width="600"/></p>,
             <p>截图来源：天眼查APP</p>,
             <p>在天眼查上搜索发现，该月子中心的运营主体注册时间仅一年，已涉及9起法律诉讼，其中包括劳务合同纠纷和房屋租赁合同纠纷。裁判文书网显示，该月子中心拖欠房东6个月房屋租金，因此被告上法庭。</p>,
             <p>另一名产妇菲菲则遭遇了更为尴尬的情况，去年3月她预定了某高端月子中心，但该月子中心在5月宣布要撤离天津市，虽然月子中心将全款退还给她，但即将临产的她不得不临时另寻一家月子中心。</p>,
             <p>据中新经纬客户端梳理，此前一共有四家主营业务为母婴护理的公司在新三板挂牌，它们分别为喜喜母婴、喜之家、福座母婴、大美股份，不过现在只剩下两家：大美股份和喜喜母婴。</p>,
             <p>从2014年-2018年的财务数据来看，这四家“月子中心”概念股可谓在盈利边缘苦苦挣扎。从2014年-2018年，大美股份和喜之家的净利润全部为负，福座母婴仅在2015年录得净利润220万元，而喜喜母婴则在连续3年亏损上千万元后在2018年录得净利润不到70万元。</p>,
             <p class="f_center"><img alt="“暴利”背后的月子中心：收费上十万" height="96" src="http://crawl.ws.126.net/2b17404d0be5fa94ad4378675abb8927.jpg" width="600"/></p>,
             <p>截图来源：wind(单位：万元) 中新经纬制表</p>,
             <p>喜喜母婴曾在年报中解释称称，母婴护理行业尚属新兴行业，正处于整体性亏损及探索阶段。目前公司处于快速发展阶段，各类广告推广、租金、人力资源的费用较大，导致收入无法覆盖各类成本费用。</p>,
             <p>据宋清辉观察，月子中心在经营方面存在诸多乱象。许多月子中心随便租几套民房、雇几名月嫂就大张旗鼓的开业了。同时，由于从业人员素质参差不齐，带来的服务水平难以保证。总体而言，月子中心行业利润都不高。每年大约有50%的月子中心会倒闭，三年存活率更低至20%。</p>,
             <p><strong>业内：准入门槛低 行业监管尚不严格</strong></p>,
             <p>据中研产业研究院发布的《2018-2023年中国月子中心行业市场深度分析及发展趋势咨询预测报告》显示，随着二胎政策的开放月子会所爆发式增长是可以预期的，但月子会所前期投入较大，整体行业缺乏监管，这是该行业存在的风险。</p>,
             <p>不过，在业内人士看来，除了各类先期费用投入较大外，部分月子中心出现亏损的原因还在于不少从业人士缺乏专业知识技能准备便盲目投入这一领域。</p>,
             <p>近日，有媒体报道称，一位庄女士花了16万元住进名媛月府月子中心，不久后发现孩子右股骨干骨折，怀疑是月子中心护理不当，而月子中心负责人回应称不清楚。</p>,
             <p>来自天津的产妇小迪在生产前参观过不少月子中心，最终她放弃了。除了家人不赞成外，她对月子中心的服务质量也表示怀疑。“一个月子会所问我，是否考虑预定，如果确定了就去找月嫂，临时找月嫂也太不正规了。”</p>,
             <p>“月子中心最早不是由健康专业人士发起的，而是社会资本以办企业的形式做起来的。企业家们多是从企业的角度来管理和运营，不可避免地带来不专业、不规范问题。”中国妇幼保健协会产后母婴康复机构管理委员会主任委员、复旦大学附属妇产科医院院长徐丛剑在接受媒体采访时说到。</p>,
             <p>新三板智库研究员邱弘毅指出，由于行业监管不严，准入门槛较低，国内的月子中心鱼龙混杂，服务质量参差不齐。目前母婴保健从业人员的资质确认机构尚未建立，国内多数母婴护理机构的从业人员都是非专业的，对从业人员的业务培训也大多采用内部培训形式，课程内容、培训时长、考核项目都由月子中心自行决定，缺乏统一的从业人员资格标准，从业人员的基本素质和专业技能和服务意识高低不一，造成了母婴护理机构服务的良莠不齐，从而制约了行业的发展。</p>,
             <p>“在国内，由于月子中心行业准入门槛较低且监管不严，导致行业中企业众多，市场集中度很低。与其他行业不同的是，母婴护理服务市场的一个重要特点就是区域性竞争，地域化销售特征明显，属于典型的零散型竞争。”邱弘毅说。</p>,
             <p>大美股份也曾在风险提示中写到，目前，中国的母婴护理行业正处于成长期，由于存在一定的地域性特征，优势企业存在进一步做大做强的机会。如果不能持续紧跟行业发展的方向，不断根据市场需求及时进行服务质量的提高和品牌的推广，加大产业链的建设，增加公司多元化的经营能力，公司将存在市场份额被挤压、毛利率逐步下降导致的持续经营风险。</p>,
             <p><div class="gg200x300">
<div adtype="rightAd" class="at_item right_ad_item" requesturl="https://nex.163.com/q?app=7BE0FC82&amp;c=money&amp;l=133&amp;site=netease&amp;affiliate=money&amp;cat=article&amp;type=logo300x250&amp;location=12"></div>
<a class="ad_hover_href" href="javascript:;" target="_self"></a>
</div><p>在邱弘毅看来，由于月子中心服务对象仅针对产后女性，且多数产妇一生只会消费1-2次。因此，月子中心在复制扩张的时候，要以可控成本提供标准化服务，为更多产后母婴家庭提供更优健康选择方案，而非“高端化”、“奢侈化”，只为小众人群提供服务的机构。</p><p>宋清辉认为，未来月子中心行业可以借助线上和线下的联动，逐渐搭载其系统化的平台和产品承载，以增加市场竞争力，提升月子会所业绩，实现增值创收。(中新经纬APP)</p><p>(应采访对象要求，文中采访对象为化名。原标题：“双面”月子中心：收费动辄上十万被指暴利 多数仍在赔钱)</p>
<!-- 作者 -->
<p></p>
<div class="ep-source cDGray">
<span class="left"><a href="http://money.163.com/"><img alt="netease" class="icon" height="12" src="https://static.ws.126.net/cnews/css13/img/end_money.png" width="13"/></a> 本文来源：澎湃新闻  </span>
<span class="ep-editor">责任编辑：刘嵩_NBJ9949</span>
</div>
<!-- 声明 -->
</p>,
             <p>在邱弘毅看来，由于月子中心服务对象仅针对产后女性，且多数产妇一生只会消费1-2次。因此，月子中心在复制扩张的时候，要以可控成本提供标准化服务，为更多产后母婴家庭提供更优健康选择方案，而非“高端化”、“奢侈化”，只为小众人群提供服务的机构。</p>,
             <p>宋清辉认为，未来月子中心行业可以借助线上和线下的联动，逐渐搭载其系统化的平台和产品承载，以增加市场竞争力，提升月子会所业绩，实现增值创收。(中新经纬APP)</p>,
             <p>(应采访对象要求，文中采访对象为化名。原标题：“双面”月子中心：收费动辄上十万被指暴利 多数仍在赔钱)</p>,
             <p></p>],

             <p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; clear: both; min-height: 1em; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;"><br style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;"/></p>,
             <p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; clear: both; min-height: 1em; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-family: Optima-Regular, PingFangTC-light; letter-spacing: 0px;">尽管就业形势激烈，上半年还是有90.4%的职场人产生了裸辞的念头，其中有裸辞念头的90后职场人更是高达91.8% 。</span></p>,
             <p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; clear: both; min-height: 1em; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;"><br style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;"/></p>,
             <p class="f_center"><img src="http://cms-bucket.ws.126.net/2019/08/22/c89983a8238c44fd86ea68943bbb26ab.jpeg?imageView&amp;thumbnail=550x0"><br/></img></p>,
             <p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; clear: both; min-height: 1em; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;">《我，到点下班》剧照</p>,
             <p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; clear: both; min-height: 1em; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;"><br style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;"/></p>,
             <p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; clear: both; min-height: 1em; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-family: Optima-Regular, PingFangTC-light;">我和几位裸辞的90后聊了聊。</span></p>,
             <p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; clear: both; min-height: 1em; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;"><br style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;"/></p>,
             <p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; clear: both; min-height: 1em; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-family: Optima-Regular, PingFangTC-light;">他们都处于25-30岁的区间，比刚步入职场的新人少了一些任性，比有娃有房贷的中年人又多了一分从容。</span></p>,
             <p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; clear: both; min-height: 1em; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;"><br style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;"/></p>,
             <p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; clear: both; min-height: 1em; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important; letter-spacing: 0px; font-family: Optima-Regular, PingFangTC-light;">在职场上厮杀久了，他们都</span><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-family: Optima-Regular, PingFangTC-light; letter-spacing: 0px;">体会过现实与期待的落差，</span><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-family: Optima-Regular, PingFangTC-light; letter-spacing: 0px;">或多或少正在经历“四分之一人生危机”。裸辞在一定程度上放大了这份危机，同时也给了他们进一步认清自己的机会。</span></p>,
             <p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; clear: both; min-height: 1em; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;"><br style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;"/></p>,
             <p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; clear: both; min-height: 1em; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-family: Optima-Regular, PingFangTC-light; letter-spacing: 0px;">为什么决定裸辞？裸辞后生活有什么变化？如何度过待业时期？以下是他们给出的思考与答案。</span><br style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;"/></p>,
             <p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; clear: both; min-height: 1em; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;"><strong style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;"><br/></strong></p>,
             <p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; clear: both; min-height: 1em; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;"><strong style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;"><br/></strong></p>,
             <p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; clear: both; min-height: 1em; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;"><strong style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;">裸辞~特~别~爽（张亚东语气）</strong></p>,
             <p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; clear: both; min-height: 1em; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;"><br style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;"/></p>,
             <p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; clear: both; min-height: 1em; text-align: left; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;"><strong style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important; letter-spacing: 0px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important; letter-spacing: 0px; font-family: Optima-Regular, PingFangTC-light; color: rgb(105, 0, 0);">小彭，27岁，沪漂，</span><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important; letter-spacing: 0px; color: rgb(105, 0, 0); font-family: Optima-Regular, PingFangTC-light;">2019年3月待业至今</span></strong></p>,
             <p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; clear: both; min-height: 1em; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;"><br style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;"/></p>,
             <p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; clear: both; min-height: 1em; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-family: Optima-Regular, PingFangTC-light; letter-spacing: 0px;">小彭最近觉得自己的生活被“偷窥”了。</span><br style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;"/></p>,
             <p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; clear: both; min-height: 1em; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;"><br style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;"/></p>,
             <p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; clear: both; min-height: 1em; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-family: Optima-Regular, PingFangTC-light;">今年的新剧《凪的新生活》第一集，女主角大岛凪就干脆利落地辞职了。</span></p>,
             <p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; clear: both; min-height: 1em; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;"><br style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;"/></p>,
             <p class="f_center"><img src="http://cms-bucket.ws.126.net/2019/08/22/f61f9289512e4662bc4046ddbfedf4d1.jpeg?imageView&amp;thumbnail=550x0"/><br/></p>,
             <p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; clear: both; min-height: 1em; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;">《凪的新生活》被称为社畜裸辞宣传片</p>,
             <p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; clear: both; min-height: 1em; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;"><br style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;"/></p>,
             <p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; clear: both; min-height: 1em; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-family: Optima-Regular, PingFangTC-light;">剧中，让大岛凪决心辞职的是一种叫“过度通气综合征”的病，具体表现为呼吸困难、心悸、出汗。</span></p>,
             <p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; clear: both; min-height: 1em; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;"><br style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;"/></p>,
             <p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; clear: both; min-height: 1em; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-family: Optima-Regular, PingFangTC-light;">几年前，小彭刚辞掉7天坐班、24小时待岗的工作时，身体也出现了这样的疲劳反应。</span></p>,
             <p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; clear: both; min-height: 1em; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;"><br style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;"/></p>,
             <p class="f_center"><img src="http://cms-bucket.ws.126.net/2019/08/22/d104132c6c5c4a449c7f8ad36193f4f4.jpeg?imageView&amp;thumbnail=550x0"/><br/></p>,
             <p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; clear: both; min-height: 1em; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;">与过度呼吸一样，这是因为精神紧张、压力过大等急性焦虑而引发的病症，小彭为此辗转了5家医院。</p>,
             <p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; clear: both; min-height: 1em; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;"><br style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;"/></p>,
             <p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; clear: both; min-height: 1em; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-family: Optima-Regular, PingFangTC-light;">病愈之后，小彭又马不停蹄地</span><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-family: Optima-Regular, PingFangTC-light; letter-spacing: 0px;">进了喜欢的公司。</span><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-family: Optima-Regular, PingFangTC-light; letter-spacing: 0px;">那是一份重复性很高，天花板很低，但薪水还不错的工作。</span></p>,
             <p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; clear: both; min-height: 1em; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;"><br style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;"/></p>,
             <p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; clear: both; min-height: 1em; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important; letter-spacing: 0px; font-family: Optima-Regular, PingFangTC-light;">四年间，她</span><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important; letter-spacing: 0px; font-family: Optima-Regular, PingFangTC-light;">见证了公司元老的出走、三轮高层更替，</span><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important; letter-spacing: 0px; font-family: Optima-Regular, PingFangTC-light;">经历过办公室恋情、职场性骚扰和同事斗争。</span></p>,
             <p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; clear: both; min-height: 1em; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;"><br style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;"/></p>,
             <p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; clear: both; min-height: 1em; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-family: Optima-Regular, PingFangTC-light;">“同事斗争就是一个劣币驱逐良币的过程。”</span></p>,
             <p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; clear: both; min-height: 1em; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;"><br style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;"/></p>,
             <p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; clear: both; min-height: 1em; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-family: Optima-Regular, PingFangTC-light;">最初的“喜欢”</span><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-family: Optima-Regular, PingFangTC-light; letter-spacing: 0px;">逐渐被消磨，公司与家之间方圆3公里的范围慢慢变成了一潭死水，小彭浮不上来，也沉不下去。</span></p>,
             <p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; clear: both; min-height: 1em; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;"><br style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;"/></p>,
             <p class="f_center"><img src="http://cms-bucket.ws.126.net/2019/08/22/64a0d431031c45fcb6707dd4f47ee883.gif"/><br/></p>,
             <p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; clear: both; min-height: 1em; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;">这些有如溺水一样挣扎的日常，和凪的生活如出一辙。图为《凪的新生活》剧照</p>,
             <p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; clear: both; min-height: 1em; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;"><br style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;"/></p>,
             <p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; clear: both; min-height: 1em; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-family: Optima-Regular, PingFangTC-light;">辞职的念头不时闪现，但她一直找不到合适的契机，直到春节前后，一个待业2个月的朋友告诉她，自己找到一份跟投资有关、待遇还不错的新工作。</span></p>,
             <p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; clear: both; min-height: 1em; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;"><br style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;"/></p>,
             <p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; clear: both; min-height: 1em; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important; letter-spacing: 0px; font-family: Optima-Regular, PingFangTC-light;">小彭问他：“40K吗？”</span><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important; letter-spacing: 0px; font-family: Optima-Regular, PingFangTC-light;">这大概是她们公司高管的薪酬标准。</span></p>,
             <p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; clear: both; min-height: 1em; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;"><br style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;"/></p>,
             <p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; clear: both; min-height: 1em; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-family: Optima-Regular, PingFangTC-light; letter-spacing: 0px;">朋友说：“不止。”</span></p>,
             <p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; clear: both; min-height: 1em; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;"><br style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;"/></p>,
             <p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; clear: both; min-height: 1em; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-family: Optima-Regular, PingFangTC-light;">看着别人改变之后变好，踟蹰已久的小彭瞬间被击中。她痛快地递了辞职信，尽管当时的她还没有任何打算。</span></p>,
             <p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; clear: both; min-height: 1em; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;"><br style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;"/></p>,
             <p class="f_center"><img src="http://cms-bucket.ws.126.net/2019/08/22/7b00a468db7547b489c0b6504e610251.jpeg?imageView&amp;thumbnail=550x0"/><br/></p>,
             <p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; clear: both; min-height: 1em; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;">《逃避可耻但有用》剧照</p>,
             <p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; clear: both; min-height: 1em; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;"><br style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;"/></p>,
             <p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; clear: both; min-height: 1em; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-family: Optima-Regular, PingFangTC-light;">说辞就辞的快乐，谁辞谁知道</span><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-family: Optima-Regular, PingFangTC-light; letter-spacing: 0px;">。</span></p>,
             <p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; clear: both; min-height: 1em; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;"><br style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;"/></p>,
             <p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; clear: both; min-height: 1em; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-family: Optima-Regular, PingFangTC-light; letter-spacing: 0px;">在这个北半球最热的夏天里，通勤的酷刑宣告废止，</span><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-family: Optima-Regular, PingFangTC-light;">“再也不用闻着别人的腋下挤公交了。”</span></p>,
             <p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; clear: both; min-height: 1em; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;"><br style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;"/></p>,
             <p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; clear: both; min-height: 1em; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-family: Optima-Regular, PingFangTC-light;">也不再有</span><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important; letter-spacing: 0px; font-family: Optima-Regular, PingFangTC-light;">昼夜不分的微信轰炸，</span><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important; letter-spacing: 0px; font-family: Optima-Regular, PingFangTC-light;">“玩手机”就是玩手机而已。</span></p>,
             <p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; clear: both; min-height: 1em; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;"><br style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;"/></p>,
             <p class="f_center"><img src="http://cms-bucket.ws.126.net/2019/08/22/eaacee05990049819bc5631e7f988003.jpeg?imageView&amp;thumbnail=550x0"/><br/></p>,
             <p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; clear: both; min-height: 1em; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;">待业的几个月里，小彭最常玩的游戏是《分手厨房》和《荒野大镖客》。</p>,
             <p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; clear: both; min-height: 1em; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;"><br style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;"/></p>,
             <p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; clear: both; min-height: 1em; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-family: Optima-Regular, PingFangTC-light; letter-spacing: 0px;">为了辞旧迎新，小彭</span><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-family: Optima-Regular, PingFangTC-light;">拿着离职发的项目奖金，兴致勃勃地买了私教课。</span></p>,
             <p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; clear: both; min-height: 1em; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;"><br style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;"/></p>,
             <p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; clear: both; min-height: 1em; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-family: Optima-Regular, PingFangTC-light;">她只挑工作时间去上课。那会更衣室不像晚上或周末那样，满地都是洗澡水和头发；</span><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important; letter-spacing: 0px; font-family: Optima-Regular, PingFangTC-light;">人少，</span><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important; letter-spacing: 0px; font-family: Optima-Regular, PingFangTC-light;">教练有空还会免费加授15分钟。</span></p>,
             <p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; clear: both; min-height: 1em; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;"><br style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;"/></p>,
             <p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; clear: both; min-height: 1em; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-family: Optima-Regular, PingFangTC-light;">等大批下了班的白领涌进健身房时，小彭已经练完回家了。“六七点钟，正好赶得上定时定点的垃圾投放。</span><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-family: Optima-Regular, PingFangTC-light; letter-spacing: 0px;">”</span></p>,
             <p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; clear: both; min-height: 1em; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;"><br style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;"/></p>,
             <p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; clear: both; min-height: 1em; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-family: Optima-Regular, PingFangTC-light;">偶尔，她会在热天的午后，听着歌，洗个澡，清洁、脱毛、去死皮，擦两遍身体乳，再敷一个保湿面膜 —— 再繁琐也不要紧，因为她不用赶时间了。</span></p>,
             <p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; clear: both; min-height: 1em; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;"><br style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;"/></p>,
             <p class="f_center"><img src="http://cms-bucket.ws.126.net/2019/08/22/373827ac2e394c5ca73d4a34b485764a.jpeg?imageView&amp;thumbnail=550x0"/><br/></p>,
             <p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; clear: both; min-height: 1em; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;">小彭有了很多时间去看展览和演出。</p>,
             <p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; clear: both; min-height: 1em; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;"><br style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;"/></p>,
             <p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; clear: both; min-height: 1em; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-family: Optima-Regular, PingFangTC-light;">裸辞并没有想象中冒险。</span></p>,
             <p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; clear: both; min-height: 1em; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;"><br style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;"/></p>,
             <p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; clear: both; min-height: 1em; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-family: Optima-Regular, PingFangTC-light;">只是，</span><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important; letter-spacing: 0px; font-family: Optima-Regular, PingFangTC-light;">大龄、未婚、无业，</span><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important; letter-spacing: 0px; font-family: Optima-Regular, PingFangTC-light;">小彭</span><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-family: Optima-Regular, PingFangTC-light; letter-spacing: 0px;">和大岛凪一样，</span><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important; letter-spacing: 0px; font-family: Optima-Regular, PingFangTC-light;">每个“人设”都触及了社会框定的标准。</span><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important; letter-spacing: 0px; font-family: Optima-Regular, PingFangTC-light;">她们都遇到了同样的质问：</span><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important; letter-spacing: 0px; font-family: Optima-Regular, PingFangTC-light;">“你以为辞职真的能让自己改变吗？”</span></p>,
             <p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; clear: both; min-height: 1em; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;"><br style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;"/></p>,
             <p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; clear: both; min-height: 1em; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-family: Optima-Regular, PingFangTC-light;">辞职在家的日子里，母亲劝她赶紧去上班，不然就先把婚结了，或者准备出国留学。</span></p>,
             <p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; clear: both; min-height: 1em; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;"><br style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;"/></p>,
             <p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; clear: both; min-height: 1em; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-family: Optima-Regular, PingFangTC-light; letter-spacing: 0px;">但在她看来，这些不过是缓兵之计，“终究不是解决方案，它无法填满你的人生。”</span></p>,
             <p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; clear: both; min-height: 1em; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;"><br style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;"/></p>,
             <p class="f_center"><img src="http://cms-bucket.ws.126.net/2019/08/22/c8a2a8f6229b42e99c6e63613455b288.jpeg?imageView&amp;thumbnail=550x0"/><br/></p>,
             <p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; clear: both; min-height: 1em; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;">小彭在记事本写下今后可以做的事情，其中一个选择是经营Airbnb。</p>,
             <p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; clear: both; min-height: 1em; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;"><br style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;"/></p>,
             <p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; clear: both; min-height: 1em; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-family: Optima-Regular, PingFangTC-light;">小彭当然知道，生活很难被一次裸辞彻底改变，但不管怎样，至少她给自己放过一个暑假。</span></p>,
             <p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; clear: both; min-height: 1em; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;"><br style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;"/></p>,
             <p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; clear: both; min-height: 1em; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-family: Optima-Regular, PingFangTC-light;">一个工作日的下午，她和辞职准备出国读研的朋友一起去逛街，往常大排长队的 </span><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-family: Optima-Regular, PingFangTC-light; letter-spacing: 0px;">Zara  </span><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-family: Optima-Regular, PingFangTC-light; letter-spacing: 0px;">冷冷清清，导购也拿出平时少有的耐心，笑呵呵地接待她们。</span></p>,
             <p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; clear: both; min-height: 1em; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;"><br style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;"/></p>,
             <p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; clear: both; min-height: 1em; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-family: Optima-Regular, PingFangTC-light;">尽情挑选、互相摆拍后，小彭最终买到了便宜又称心的打折夏装。</span></p>,
             <p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; clear: both; min-height: 1em; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;"><br style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;"/></p>,
             <p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; clear: both; min-height: 1em; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-family: Optima-Regular, PingFangTC-light;">朋友则忍不住感慨：“不上班太爽了，让那些还在写字楼里的人都去死吧！”</span></p>,
             <p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; clear: both; min-height: 1em; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;"><br style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;"/></p>,
             <p class="f_center"><img src="http://cms-bucket.ws.126.net/2019/08/22/5003c080868a4ab4bc06faeac914395f.gif"/><br/></p>,
             <p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; clear: both; min-height: 1em; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;">“好幸福”<br style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;"/></p>,
             <p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; clear: both; min-height: 1em; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;"><strong style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;"><br/></strong></p>,
             <p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; clear: both; min-height: 1em; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;"><strong style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;"><br/></strong></p>,
             <p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; clear: both; min-height: 1em; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;"><strong style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;"><br/></strong></p>,
             <p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; clear: both; min-height: 1em; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;"><strong style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;">“裸辞后，</strong></p>,
             <p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; clear: both; min-height: 1em; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;"><strong style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;">我试着</strong><strong style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;">让</strong><strong style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;">女朋友</strong><strong style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;">包养我”</strong></p>,
             <p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; clear: both; min-height: 1em; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;"><strong style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;"></strong></p>,
             <p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; clear: both; min-height: 1em; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;"><br style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;"/></p>,
             <p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; clear: both; min-height: 1em; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;"><strong style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important; letter-spacing: 0px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important; color: rgb(105, 0, 0); font-family: Optima-Regular, PingFangTC-light; letter-spacing: 0px;">毕镜，27岁，上海土著，</span></strong><strong style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important; letter-spacing: 0px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important; color: rgb(105, 0, 0); font-family: Optima-Regular, PingFangTC-light; letter-spacing: 0px;">待业4个月</span></strong><br style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;"/></p>,
             <p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; clear: both; min-height: 1em; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;"><br style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;"/></p>,
             <p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; clear: both; min-height: 1em; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-family: Optima-Regular, PingFangTC-light;">今年4月，毕镜辞掉了他人生的第一份工作。</span></p>,
             <p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; clear: both; min-height: 1em; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;"><br style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;"/></p>,
             <p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; clear: both; min-height: 1em; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-family: Optima-Regular, PingFangTC-light;">其实他对这份工作很有感情，就在提辞职前一天，他还发了入职四周年的朋友圈。</span></p>,
             <p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; clear: both; min-height: 1em; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;"><br style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;"/></p>,
             <p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; clear: both; min-height: 1em; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-family: Optima-Regular, PingFangTC-light;">但空降的新领导凭实力摧毁了这份感情。</span></p>,
             <p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; clear: both; min-height: 1em; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;"><br style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;"/></p>,
             <p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; clear: both; min-height: 1em; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-family: Optima-Regular, PingFangTC-light;">在这位喜欢吹牛皮的新领导身上，毕镜看不到任何与岗位匹配的能力，同事们也怨声载道：</span></p>,
             <p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; clear: both; min-height: 1em; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;"><br style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;"/></p>,
             <p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; clear: both; min-height: 1em; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important; letter-spacing: 0px; font-family: Optima-Regular, PingFangTC-light;">“傻X领导不配拥有我们</span><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important; letter-spacing: 0px; font-family: Optima-Regular, PingFangTC-light;">。</span><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important; letter-spacing: 0px; font-family: Optima-Regular, PingFangTC-light;">”</span></p>,
             <p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; clear: both; min-height: 1em; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;"><br style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;"/></p>,
             <p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; clear: both; min-height: 1em; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important; letter-spacing: 0px; font-family: Optima-Regular, PingFangTC-light;">一直以来，毕镜都想和同事们一起做点很酷的事，那么事到如今，这件事只能是一起辞职。</span><br style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;"/></p>,
             <p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; clear: both; min-height: 1em; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;"><br style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;"/></p>,
             <p class="f_center"><img src="http://cms-bucket.ws.126.net/2019/08/22/df68fa0b94bc46f69185832248faf8b2.jpeg?imageView&amp;thumbnail=550x0"/><br/></p>,
             <p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; clear: both; min-height: 1em; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;"><br style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;"/></p>,
             <p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; clear: both; min-height: 1em; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-family: Optima-Regular, PingFangTC-light;">然而裸辞后的每分每秒，都比想象中难熬。</span></p>,
             <p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; clear: both; min-height: 1em; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;"><br style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;"/></p>,
             <p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; clear: both; min-height: 1em; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-family: Optima-Regular, PingFangTC-light;">办完离职的第二天，毕镜就开始在家做简历了。</span></p>,
             <p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; clear: both; min-height: 1em; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;"><br style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;"/></p>,
             <p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; clear: both; min-height: 1em; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important; letter-spacing: 0px; font-family: Optima-Regular, PingFangTC-light;">他把几款主流的求职</span><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important; letter-spacing: 0px; font-family: Optima-Regular, PingFangTC-light;">App</span><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important; letter-spacing: 0px; font-family: Optima-Regular, PingFangTC-light;">都注册了一遍。</span><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important; letter-spacing: 0px; font-family: Optima-Regular, PingFangTC-light;">待业的第一个月，</span><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important; letter-spacing: 0px; font-family: Optima-Regular, PingFangTC-light;">他投出了100份简历。</span><br style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;"/></p>,
             <p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; clear: both; min-height: 1em; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;"><br style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;"/></p>,
             <p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; clear: both; min-height: 1em; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-family: Optima-Regular, PingFangTC-light;">其中一款APP的个人应聘记录里，有个叫“已储备”的列表。它告诉毕镜，HR已储备该简历，如有需要会随时联系。</span><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-family: Optima-Regular, PingFangTC-light; letter-spacing: 0px;">在毕镜的理解里，这意味着他投出的简历没有石沉大海。</span></p>,
             <p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; clear: both; min-height: 1em; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;"><br style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;"/></p>,
             <p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; clear: both; min-height: 1em; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-family: Optima-Regular, PingFangTC-light; letter-spacing: 0px;">于是他怀着期待，像没有人给他写信的上校一样等待着HR的来电。</span></p>,
             <p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; clear: both; min-height: 1em; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;"><br style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;"/></p>,
             <p class="f_center"><img src="http://cms-bucket.ws.126.net/2019/08/22/c3b264b61e344914bd89ecd9e0fa0bb8.jpeg?imageView&amp;thumbnail=550x0"/><br/></p>,
             <p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; clear: both; min-height: 1em; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;">前同事分享给毕镜的一首诗。</p>,
             <p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; clear: both; min-height: 1em; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;"><br style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;"/></p>,
             <p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; clear: both; min-height: 1em; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-family: Optima-Regular, PingFangTC-light;">漫长的等待中，</span><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-family: Optima-Regular, PingFangTC-light; letter-spacing: 0px;">日常生活不可避免地失去了原本的节奏。</span></p>,
             <p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; clear: both; min-height: 1em; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;"><br style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;"/></p>,
             <p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; clear: both; min-height: 1em; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-family: Optima-Regular, PingFangTC-light; letter-spacing: 0px;">不再有同事每天准时在群里问“中午吃什么”，毕镜把早午饭并做一顿，随便吃点面包零食。</span></p>,
             <p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; clear: both; min-height: 1em; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;"><br style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;"/></p>,
             <p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; clear: both; min-height: 1em; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-family: Optima-Regular, PingFangTC-light;">网购频率也不可避免地降低了。</span></p>,
             <p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; clear: both; min-height: 1em; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;"><br style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;"/></p>,
             <p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; clear: both; min-height: 1em; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-family: Optima-Regular, PingFangTC-light;">淘气值早已跌破1000，“我已经没有资格续费阿里的‘88会员</span><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-family: Optima-Regular, PingFangTC-light; letter-spacing: 0px;">’了</span><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-family: Optima-Regular, PingFangTC-light; letter-spacing: 0px;">。”</span></p>,
             <p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; clear: both; min-height: 1em; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;"><br style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;"/></p>,
             <p class="f_center"><img src="http://cms-bucket.ws.126.net/2019/08/22/b8aff3b66d0f4bfabc9857280c2242cf.jpeg?imageView&amp;thumbnail=550x0"/><br/></p>,
             <p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; clear: both; min-height: 1em; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;">《凪的新生活》剧照</p>,
             <p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; clear: both; min-height: 1em; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;"><br style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;"/></p>,
             <p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; clear: both; min-height: 1em; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-family: Optima-Regular, PingFangTC-light;">为了省钱，他</span><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-family: Optima-Regular, PingFangTC-light; letter-spacing: 0px;">停掉了</span><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-family: Optima-Regular, PingFangTC-light; letter-spacing: 0px;">迅雷和百度网盘的会员。</span></p>,
             <p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; clear: both; min-height: 1em; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;"><br style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;"/></p>,
             <p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; clear: both; min-height: 1em; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-family: Optima-Regular, PingFangTC-light;">女友的生日礼物预算则直接砍掉了一个零，从一个包包变成了1000出头的AirPods。</span></p>,
             <p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; clear: both; min-height: 1em; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;"><br style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;"/></p>,
             <p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; clear: both; min-height: 1em; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-family: Optima-Regular, PingFangTC-light;">最喜欢的乐高当然也舍不得再买。在等待HR回音的过程中，他怀着“这是今年最后一个乐高”的心情，把去年双十一的囤货一块块拼完。</span></p>,
             <p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; clear: both; min-height: 1em; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-family: Optima-Regular, PingFangTC-light;"><br style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;"/></span></p>,
             <p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; clear: both; min-height: 1em; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-family: Optima-Regular, PingFangTC-light;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;">还好MUJI一再降价，让他能用89元买到体面的衬衣。</span></span></p>,
             <p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; clear: both; min-height: 1em; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;"><br style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;"/></p>,
             <p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; clear: both; min-height: 1em; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-family: Optima-Regular, PingFangTC-light;">三个月后，女朋友成功跳槽到另一家公司，升职，加薪。</span><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-family: Optima-Regular, PingFangTC-light; letter-spacing: 0px;">而他还是没有工作。</span></p>,
             <p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; clear: both; min-height: 1em; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;"><br style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;"/></p>,
             <p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; clear: both; min-height: 1em; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-family: Optima-Regular, PingFangTC-light;">他尝试让女朋友用每月1800元的费用包养他，“我可以做家务和买菜”，被女朋友拒绝了。</span></p>,
             <p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; clear: both; min-height: 1em; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;"><br style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;"/></p>,
             <p class="f_center"><img src="http://cms-bucket.ws.126.net/2019/08/22/95d50e9636fd4686b779f8a4da401d3d.jpeg?imageView&amp;thumbnail=550x0"/><br/></p>,
             <p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; clear: both; min-height: 1em; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;">毕镜给女朋友做的菜。</p>,
             <p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; clear: both; min-height: 1em; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;"><br style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;"/></p>,
             <p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; clear: both; min-height: 1em; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-family: Optima-Regular, PingFangTC-light;">事实上，他和女友都是上海本地人，不用付房租，每天还都有存款利息和理财进帐，“没有太大的经济压力</span><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-family: Optima-Regular, PingFangTC-light; letter-spacing: 0px;">”</span><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-family: Optima-Regular, PingFangTC-light; letter-spacing: 0px;">。</span><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-family: Optima-Regular, PingFangTC-light; letter-spacing: 0px;">但在更长远的人生计划里，他需要为结婚攒够一定数量的钱。</span></p>,
             <p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; clear: both; min-height: 1em; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;"><br style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;"/></p>,
             <p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; clear: both; min-height: 1em; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-family: Optima-Regular, PingFangTC-light; letter-spacing: 0px;">很显然，待业打乱了这个计划。</span></p>,
             <p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; clear: both; min-height: 1em; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;"><br style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;"/></p>,
             <p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; clear: both; min-height: 1em; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-family: Optima-Regular, PingFangTC-light; letter-spacing: 0px;">他给自己划拨了2万的待业预算，希望能在这笔钱花完之前找到新工作。</span></p>,
             <p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; clear: both; min-height: 1em; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;"><br style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;"/></p>,
             <p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; clear: both; min-height: 1em; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-family: Optima-Regular, PingFangTC-light; letter-spacing: 0px;">只是整整三个月，没有一个HR回应他的简历。</span></p>,
             <p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; clear: both; min-height: 1em; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;"><br style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;"/></p>,
             <p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; clear: both; min-height: 1em; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-family: Optima-Regular, PingFangTC-light; letter-spacing: 0px;">有天他打开招聘软件，发现“已储备”列表的名字变成了“不合适”。那一刻，</span><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important; letter-spacing: 0px; font-family: Optima-Regular, PingFangTC-light;">毕镜决定不海投了，就这样呆着，“等自己被工作找到</span><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important; letter-spacing: 0px; font-family: Optima-Regular, PingFangTC-light;">”。</span></p>,
             <p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; clear: both; min-height: 1em; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;"><br style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;"/></p>,
             <p class="f_center"><img src="http://cms-bucket.ws.126.net/2019/08/22/065df65f3042497da518f3f624d9c941.jpeg?imageView&amp;thumbnail=550x0"/><br/></p>,
             <p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; clear: both; min-height: 1em; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;">裸辞后，毕镜把原本贴在门背后的理想户型图摘了下来：“今年还是算了”。</p>,
             <p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; clear: both; min-height: 1em; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;"><br style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;"/></p>,
             <p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; clear: both; min-height: 1em; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-family: Optima-Regular, PingFangTC-light; letter-spacing: 0px;">在裸辞的第四个月，</span><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-family: Optima-Regular, PingFangTC-light; letter-spacing: 0px;">命运总算眷顾了毕镜</span><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-family: Optima-Regular, PingFangTC-light; letter-spacing: 0px;">。</span><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-family: Optima-Regular, PingFangTC-light; letter-spacing: 0px;">七月的一天，</span><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-family: Optima-Regular, PingFangTC-light; letter-spacing: 0px;">跳槽到其他公司的领导向他抛出了橄榄枝。</span></p>,
             <p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; clear: both; min-height: 1em; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;"><br style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;"/></p>,
             <p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; clear: both; min-height: 1em; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-family: Optima-Regular, PingFangTC-light; letter-spacing: 0px;">早8晚9，7天无休，</span><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-family: Optima-Regular, PingFangTC-light;">台风过境的周末，毕镜在公司加了整整两天班。</span></p>,
             <p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; clear: both; min-height: 1em; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;"><br style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;"/></p>,
             <p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; clear: both; min-height: 1em; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-family: Optima-Regular, PingFangTC-light; letter-spacing: 0px;">入职第一周，</span><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-family: Optima-Regular, PingFangTC-light; letter-spacing: 0px;">他忍不住在前同事群里发了一条消息：“我为什么想</span><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-family: Optima-Regular, PingFangTC-light; letter-spacing: 0px;">要</span><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-family: Optima-Regular, PingFangTC-light; letter-spacing: 0px;">上班？？？”</span></p>,
             <p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; clear: both; min-height: 1em; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;"><br style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;"/></p>,
             <p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; clear: both; min-height: 1em; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-family: Optima-Regular, PingFangTC-light;">同事回他：“那明天就去提辞职。”</span></p>,
             <p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; clear: both; min-height: 1em; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;"><strong style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;"><br/></strong></p>,
             <p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; clear: both; min-height: 1em; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;"><strong style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;"><br/></strong></p>,
             <p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; clear: both; min-height: 1em; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;"><strong style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;"><br/></strong></p>,
             <p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; clear: both; min-height: 1em; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;"><strong style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;">在家躺平一年半，我彻底自闭了</strong></p>,
             <p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; clear: both; min-height: 1em; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;"><br style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;"/></p>,
             <p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; clear: both; min-height: 1em; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;"><strong style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important; letter-spacing: 0px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important; color: rgb(105, 0, 0); font-family: Optima-Regular, PingFangTC-light; letter-spacing: 0px;">小原，29岁，北漂，</span></strong><strong style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important; letter-spacing: 0px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important; color: rgb(105, 0, 0); font-family: Optima-Regular, PingFangTC-light; letter-spacing: 0px;">待业一年半</span></strong></p>,
